html:
made = cut, or solemnized.

made a covenant. It is alleged that the use of the word"covenant" is confined to Jehovah by the "second Isaiah" (i.e. after Isa 40): but it is so used before that (SeeIsaiah 24:5 ;Isaiah 33:8), But why should not a covenant be made with, and by, other parties as it is here inIsaiah 28:15 ,Isaiah 28:18 ? See App-79.

hell. Hebrew Sheol. App-35.
